name: Disk of Amontillado
description:
NOTE: first zip file uploaded after 11 am but patches a bug

Crack into a file system and delete certain files while locating and reading other. The more you corrupt the better.

Controls: Drag your tools in the top left with your mouse into the folder shown on the left. Folders will be locked until you gain read access.

To use a tool you must surpass the firewall, which is harder to do the bigger the tool you are using. Control the green and white square with wasd or the arrow keys

By Sean Hurt and Veronica Peterson
